meanings.definition: Not using or marked by irony
meanings.sent1: Her unironic smile showed her true happiness.
meanings.sent2: His unironic response was refreshing in a world full of sarcasm.
meanings.sent3: It was unironic how he kept a straight face while telling a joke.
meanings.sent4: The unironic tone of her voice made it clear she was serious.
meanings.sent5: The unironic nature of his words resonated with everyone in the room.

meanings.sent1: Their unironic apology was heartfelt and touching.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his unironic compliments that came from the heart.
meanings.sent3: It was unironic how he always remembered her favorite flowers.
meanings.sent4: The unironic love in their eyes was evident to all who saw them together.
meanings.sent5: The unironic joy in her laughter was contagious to everyone around her.
